page.title: 08A HOUSEWIFE'S DAY
page.content: BEING A PERSON OF REGULAR HABITS,I RISE IN THE MORNING AT 6:30 AM READY TO COPE WITH THE DAYS EVENTS.AT 7:30 I AROUSE MY TWO SONS TO GET READY FOR THIER DEPARTUER TO WORK.AFTER BREAKFAST-9:00-I COMMENCE TO HELP WITH THE DAILY CHORES.LATER IN THE MORNING I GO OUT DO A LITTLE SHOPPING AND STOP TO TALK WITH DIFFERENT FRIENDS I MEET..AFTER LUNCH I SETTLE DOWN IN THE LOUNGE TO WATCH TELEVISION,FOLLOWING THE NEWS AND CURRENT AFAIRS.BY 2:00 I GENERALLY HAVE A NAP.WHEN I AWAKE I USUALLY READ THE NEWSPAPERS OR BOOKS.THE EVENING IS SPENT RELAXING AND DISCUSSING FAMILY AFFAIRS AND HAPPENINGS IN THE NEIGHBOURHOOD.BY 10:30 PM ONE IS READY TO RETIRE TO BED.THE DAY PASSES QUICKLY.BOREDOM IS NOT ONE OF THE SYMPTOMS I SUFFER FROM.
